extensionDescription.message: Removes certain target attribute from links, which forces the browser to open every link in the current tab instead of a new tab or window.

config_ignoreTarget_caption.message: Clear target attribute if the link is:

config_ignoreTargetBlank_label.message: Opened in new tab or window always (_blank)

config_ignoreTargetSelfOrAncestor_label.message: Loaded into ancestor frames or the frame itself (_self, _parent, _top)
